metadata.title: CVE-2018-10393 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
bark_noise_hybridmp in psy.c in Xiph.Org libvorbis 1.3.6 has a stack-basedbuffer over-read.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-10393` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvorbis0a - 1.3.5-3ubuntu0.2+esm1
libvorbisenc2 - 1.3.5-3ubuntu0.2+esm1
libvorbisfile3 - 1.3.5-3ubuntu0.2+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libvorbis package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.3.5-3ubuntu0.2+esm1').
